Title: HDK - WinRT MVVM and MEF Friendly Prism Framework port
Description:
HDK - is a "spare-time" framework for WinRT development.
Solution consists of:
- MVVM
- Event Aggregator
- PRISM
- other useful extensions
HomeWiki:
Project Description
HDK - is a "spare-time" framework for WinRT development.
Solution consists of:
- MVVM
- Event Aggregator
- PRISM
- other useful extensions



I've migrated Prism from SL to WinRT, it was a hard work.
I've stripped all Unity references and updated its code to use MEF and EventAggregator instead.

ps: Its code is far from ideal but still good enough to operate as it was designed :)
